q1.question: How long does same-day delivery take?
q1.answer: Same-day delivery is completed within the same business day if the order is placed before our 14:00 cut-off time. Delivery typically occurs within 4-8 hours depending on the destination within Dubai, Sharjah, or Abu Dhabi city limits.

q2.question: Do you offer integrations for online stores?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive e-commerce integrations for multi-vendor platforms. Our Last Mile service is designed specifically for online stores and can integrate with most major e-commerce platforms.

q3.question: What zones do you cover?
q3.answer: We cover all seven Emirates in the UAE. For same-day delivery, we focus on Dubai, Sharjah, and Abu Dhabi city limits. Our domestic service covers all Emirates, and we also specialize in international freight between UAE and Latin America.

q4.question: How can I track my shipment?
q4.answer: You can track your shipment in real-time using your tracking ID (format: PX00000) on our website. Simply enter your tracking number in the tracking section, and you'll see the current status and location of your shipment.

tracking.title: Track Your Shipment
tracking.subtitle: Enter your tracking ID to see real-time updates
tracking.notFound: Shipment not found. Please check your tracking ID and try again.
tracking.error: An error occurred while tracking your shipment. Please try again later.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common tracking questions

q1.question: What is my tracking number format?
q1.answer: Your tracking number starts with "PX" followed by numbers. For example: PX00001 or PX202500001. You can find your tracking number in the confirmation email or SMS we sent when your shipment was created.

q2.question: How often is tracking information updated?
q2.answer: Tracking information is updated in real-time as your package moves through our network. Major status updates include: Pickup Completed, In Transit, Out for Delivery, and Delivered.

q3.question: What do the different status messages mean?
q3.answer:
Pending: Shipment created, awaiting pickup
Picked Up: Package collected from sender
In Transit: Package is on its way to destination
Out for Delivery: Package is with the delivery driver
Delivered: Package successfully delivered
On Hold: Delivery attempt unsuccessful, package at facility

q4.question: My tracking number is not working. What should I do?
q4.answer: Make sure you entered the correct tracking number (starts with PX). Tracking may take up to 2 hours to activate after shipment creation. Check for typos or extra spaces. Contact our support team via WhatsApp if the issue persists.

q5.question: Can I track multiple packages at once?
q5.answer: Currently, you can track one package at a time using this page. If you're a business customer with multiple shipments, you can access our Customer Portal for bulk tracking and shipment management features.

q6.question: What is Proof of Delivery (POD)?
q6.answer: Proof of Delivery is a confirmation that your package was successfully delivered. It may include a photo of the delivered package, recipient signature, or delivery confirmation. When available, you can view the POD by clicking the link in the tracking timeline.
